overview: Sundae Girl is the debut video release of “Japan’s 2010 Sexy Rising Star” (Japan’s Gold GT Magazine) 18 year old Natsuki Kojima. The magazine went on to praise Sundae Girl, saying that it marks a “groundbreaking achievement in Pink Cinema. Filmed with such beauty that it feels like Natsu-chan will crawl out of the TV and into your living room.” Sundae Girl has already proven a wake-up call for pink studios in Japan and according to Gold GT Magazine represents “the turning of a new page in the industry.”
title: Sundae Girl
